title: How a cheque book works
creator_credit: Raymond Leach, Andrew J. Helgeson, Austral Pacific Productions and National Bank of Australia
brief_description: An animated film in which a young boy’s enquiries about money lead to a lesson on the uses of a cheque book. During a visit to the bank the role of the manager, and other bank services are explained.
creator_credit_for_label: Raymond Leach, Andrew J. Helgeson, Austral Pacific Productions and National Bank of Australia
